title: Guardian Core
description: Guardian Core is the second book of the Sky Stone series written by Scarlett Van Dijk. It is classified as a young adult, fantasy novel.  Blurb: When Skyla was thrown into the magical land of Branzia, she had no idea what was in store for her. But now, after becoming a legend throughout the land, she realizes that she isn’t finished yet…  Thrown into inner turmoil, with her greatest weakness exposed, she must now step into a major project which could shape the future for all Sky Guardians; the Guardian Core. It isn’t long before this future is threatened. Skyla must overcome these new challenges… or be destroyed by what is most precious to her.
author: Scarlett Van Dijk
